name: Pichu
author: Atsuko Nishida
flavor_text: The electric pouches on its cheeks are still small. They cannot store much electricity yet.

poke_power.name: Baby Evolution
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put Pikachu from your hand onto Pichu (this counts as evolving Pichu) and remove all damage counters from Pichu.

attacks.name: Electric Circuit
attacks.effect: Search your discard pile for up to 4 {L} Energy cards, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand.
